projectDescription: A hobby project of a digital library. Features web app for readers, admin dashboard and WebAPI with full control over the platform.

features.title: Personalized recommendations
features.description: User recommendations based on activity, preferences and overall popularity

features.title: Library of over 4800 books
features.description: Access library of over 4800 books and search more via integration with OpenLib and other sources

features.title: Full system support with admin tools
features.description: Includes CMS, user activity management, library population from external sources, and general statistics

features.title: Web API with full controll over the system
features.description: RESTful API that provides complete access to all platform's features
